name: Golfly
description:
This is my entry for the 2020 mix an jam for the theme "Mix genres". In this game I'm doing minigolf + flying. This game will also be used as an entry for the GitHub GameOff with the theme moonshot. 

How to play
  • Left click and drag on the ball to to charge your shot, release to shoot (right click to cancel)
  • While in the air, use Left & Right (A,D or Q,D) to steer left or right
  • The goal is to send your ball to the flag
  • DO NOT escape planet's gravity
  • Avoid deadly obstacles
  • DO NOT run out of shots

CAREFUL!
I think there's a bug with the ball steering when going to the left of the planet. To avoid that, please launch only to the right of the planet!
